record.title: PRESIDENTIAL RECORDS ACT AMENDMENTS OF 2007
record.chair: The pending business is the question of suspending the rules and passing the bill, H.R. 1255, as amended.
record.narrative: The Clerk read the title of the bill.
record.chair: The question is on the motion offered by the gentleman from Missouri (Mr. Clay) that the House suspend the rules and pass the bill, H.R. 1255, as amended, on which the yeas and nays are ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, on rollcall No. 143 I inadvertently voted "nay." I meant to vote "yea."
